channel.title: CVE Feed for Bosch -- Access Professional Edition
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Bosch -- Access Professional Edition

item.title: CVE-2019-11899|2024-09-17T02:17:02.364Z -- bosch -- access%20professional%20edition
item.description: An unauthenticated attacker can achieve unauthorized access to sensitive data by exploiting Windows SMB protocol on a client installation. With Bosch Access Professional Edition (APE) 3.8, client installations need to be authorized by the APE administrator.

item.title: CVE-2019-11898|2024-09-17T04:09:20.767Z -- bosch -- access%20professional%20edition
item.description: Unauthorized APE administration privileges can be achieved by reverse engineering one of the APE service tools. The service tool is discontinued with Bosch Access Professional Edition (APE) 3.8.
